articles.description: Ind vs SL Final Live Updates: Ishan Kishan smashed the final shot and India lifts Asia Cup 2023 after 5 years. India defeated Sri Lanka by 10-wickets owing to magical bowling spell of Mohammed Siraj who clinched 6 wickets.
